name: instagram-intelligence
title: Instagram Intelligence + AI Vision Analysis API
description: Scrape Instagram profiles and posts via mobile proxy, with AI-powered vision analysis for account type detection, content themes, sentiment, authenticity scoring, and brand safety recommendations.

profile.description: Per profile lookup (followers, bio, engagement rate, posting frequency)

posts.description: Per posts fetch (up to 12 recent posts with captions, likes, hashtags)

analyze.description: Full analysis: profile + posts + AI vision (account type, themes, sentiment, authenticity)

images.description: AI vision analysis of post images only (content themes, style, brand safety)

audit.description: Authenticity audit: fake follower detection, engagement patterns, bot signals

endpoints.description: Get Instagram profile data with engagement metrics
Get recent Instagram posts with captions, likes, comments, hashtags
Full AI-powered profile analysis: account type, content themes, sentiment, authenticity, brand recommendations
AI vision analysis of post images: content themes, style, aesthetic consistency, brand safety score
Authenticity audit: fake follower detection, engagement pattern analysis, bot signal detection

features: Instagram profile scraping (followers, bio, engagement rate, posting frequency)
Recent posts extraction (captions, likes, comments, hashtags, timestamps)
AI vision analysis via GPT-4o or Claude (with heuristic fallback)
Account type classification (influencer, business, personal, bot/fake, meme page, news media)
Content theme detection (travel, food, fashion, fitness, tech, beauty, etc.)
Authenticity scoring (0-100) with fake follower detection
Brand safety scoring and brand alignment recommendations
Mobile proxy for authentic Instagram data (avoids blocks)
infrastructure: Proxies.sx mobile proxies (real 4G/5G IPs) + OpenAI GPT-4o / Anthropic Claude vision
